name: Masnun Siam
aboutDescription: Hello! I am Masnun Siam, a professional Flutter application developer with  3 years of experience and a background in Computer Science. My specialization is developing iOS and Android applications using Flutter SDK. I am looking to build a career with a company that offers a hi‐tech environment with committed and dedicated people who can help me realize my potential. I am willing to work as a key player in a challenging and creative environment.

experiences.description: Development of an offline-first mobile snagging application for Disneyland Paris, streamlining information gathering for technical experts in the field and enhancing communication with maintenance services for problem-solving.

Development of a Progressive Web App for security systems technicians, that allows them to generate comprehensive quotes in PDF format including photos. This enables immediate delivery of quotes to customers after the visit.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description:
Yes, it's THIS portfolio! 
This project follows a Riverpod-based Architecture, using a feature-first approach for its structure. It is fully responsive, and supports multiple themes.

projects.name: Dosh Eats
projects.description: A Food delivery app built with Flutter and Firebase. It supports multiple restaurants, and features a cart system, order tracking, and a user-friendly interface. It comes with 3 apps: one for the customer, one for the restaurant, and one for the delivery person.

projects.name: Dosh Network
projects.description: This is a video streaming app built with Flutter. It works with API provided from a wordpress website. It supports multiple categories, and features a user-friendly interface.
